#### Overview

The [Sentinel-3 Synthetic Aperture Radar Altimeter (SRAL) Level-0](https://sentinels.copernicus.eu/web/sentinel/user-guides/sentinel-3-altimetry/processing-levels/level-0){target='_blank'} product contains raw data acquired by the SRAL instrument onboard the Sentinel-3 satellite. The data contains raw, time-tagged radar echoes and instrument housekeeping data, along with metadata describing the acquisition parameters and instrument characteristics.
